algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, keeping track of accumulated cost and max cost in consecutive same-colored segments.
problem_summary_simple: Minimize time to remove balloons so no two adjacent balloons have the same color.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy approach: for consecutive same-colored balloons, remove all but the one with the highest cost.
key_insights: The problem can be solved greedily by processing contiguous blocks of same-colored balloons.
Within a block, to minimize cost, we keep the balloon with the maximum `neededTime` and remove others.
The total cost is the sum of costs of removed balloons.
